text: Egha an aveghbuaba mɨgɨavɨra itima, Midian gumazir dagɨaba bagha ingarir maba iza Josepɨn garima, a mozimɨn iti. Ezɨ aveghbuaba a gekuizɨ an anabozɨ, me pura ingangarir gumazir kɨnimɨn mɨn Ismaelian gumazibar anemada. Ezɨ Ismaelian gumaziba 20 silvan dagɨaba Midianian gumazibagh anigha, Josep inigha Isipɨn kantrin zui.
